job.title: Software Engineer III
job.description: stronguPosition Summary What Youll DobrustrongulliWhat youll dobrliulImagine working in an environment where one line of code can make life easier for hundreds of millions of people and put a smile on their face Thats what we do at Walmart Global Tech Were a team of 15000 software engineers data scientists and service professionals within Walmart the worlds largest retailer delivering innovations that improve how our customers shop and empower our 22 million associates To others innovation looks like an app service or some code but Walmart has always been about people People are why we innovate and people power our innovations emBeing human led is our true disruptionbrbremWere looking for a Software Engineer to join International Cart and Checkout team  Want to change how different countries shop online Then keep readingbrbrstronguAbout YoubrbrustrongYou are a passionate backend engineer who loves to code You love to take ideas and build great serverside code with Java Spring and other frameworks You might like to talk about obscure computer science topics but really you just want to write simple code and ship new products and features to customers or improve existing onesbrbrYour focus is on backend distributed Java code which is readable performant supportable You are curious and are always ready to learn new things and solve hard problemsYou are passionate about code reviews and contribute towards high quality codebrbrThings You will dobrbrstronguThat Said Here Are Some Things Youll DobrbrustrongWalmart International is a diverse and fastgrowing business unit so youll get experience on many different projects across the organizationbrulli Build reusable artifacts which can be used across micro serviceslili Refactor or improve existing code We constantly find ways to improve all of our Java code and you are all aboardlili Work closely with our product design performant solutions for customerslili Demonstrate technical expertise in solving challenging programming and design problemslili Share what you know and learn either oneonone or with lightning talks to the grouplili Work boldly with a sense of urgency embrace mistakes learn from them and drive the team toward successbrliulstronguMinimum Qualificationsbrustrongulli2 years of experience in objectoriented design and software development using Java 8 and abovelili1 Experience with spring bootlili2 years of experience with Databases SQLNOSQLlili1 years of experience in creating andor consuming RESTful web service using Java  spring based frameworksliliBSMS in computer science or equivalent work experienceliliExperience with messaging eg Kafka JMS etc and eventdriven architecture is plusliululliPreferred RequirementsliulliSolid grasp of various software design patterns and distributed computing liliPrior knowledge of JunitTestNG for unit testing application liliSolid understanding of relational and nonrelational database technologies SQL and Cosmos DB data modeling and RESTful web APIs liliFamiliar in working with collaborative environment using Agile SCRUM practices liliWorking Knowledge of multithreading apis Completable Futureliulul Minimum QualificationsbrbrememOutlined below are the required minimum qualifications for this position If none are listed there are no minimum qualifications brbrememBachelors degree in Computer Science and 2 years experience in software engineering or related field OR 4 years experience in software engineering or related field Preferred QualificationsbrbrememOutlined below are the optional preferred qualifications for this position If none are listed there are no preferred qualifications brbrememMasters Computer Science Primary Location800 W California Ave Sunnyvale CA 94086 United States of America
